page.title: 03The Farm
page.content: On my uncle's farm,there are 120 milking cows,and 50 calves.He has got a dog called Fly and it gets the cows in every day.He has 4 tractors and lots of implements.In the summer he bales.He makes silage as well.This summer he got 5000 bales.He will need a lot of bales to feed all his animals.He has got Massey Ferguson tractors.He has got a Ford digger.Last summer I helped him with his silage.He has got a New Holland combine.In the morning the milk tanker comes to the farm for the milk.When he comes he gets a long pipe and connects it onto the tank to get the milk out.He has got a bull and it charges at you.After he does the milking he lets the cows out.When he comes back in he cleans out the milking palour. BY Kevin Millar and Robin Sneddon
